name: DoVi Remux
description: Remuxes media with Dolby Vision metadata from MKV to MP4, for better support on LG WebOS TVs

versions.changelog:
- Plugin will now remux all Dolby Vision content, regardless of profile
- Added a Primary User config option, which will:
  - Skip remuxing for previously-watched content
  - Delete remuxes after the user has watched them

- Removed the default task trigger
- Removed the post-scan task which merges remuxed versions
- Added support for multiple and non-English audio streams
- Added a configuration page
